Name: Bitcoin VR
About the game: Ok this is pretty geeky and may not be for all but we think it`s cool, the first VR bitcoin block explorer! Ever wanted to see real time bitcoin transaction in VR? Ever wanted to prune the blockchain with a bow and arrow? Enter the forest of satoshi! In Bitcoin VR you can see real time bitcoin transactions fall from the sky in the form of gems you can grab a gem to see the transaction details or shoot them with a Bow and Arrow. Key Aspects: The larger the transaction size the larger the gem! Block confirmation effects! View counterparty token transactions! Archery and mini game!
